website_summaries.verdict: With over 65 gym-quality exercises available on it, this is the home gym for the serious workout enthusiast.
pros: There’s no need to worry about tipping over because this beauty has a reinforced X-shaped base for increased stability
You can strengthen your abs, back, arms, and legs in the comfort of home
cons: The initial cost is high, but you make it up in savings on monthly gym fees

customer_reviews.title: Maximum Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a fantastic machine! I had a handyman put it together, but he said that it was so well made that it just went right together with no problem in no time. The 7 boxes scared me, but he said I probably could have done it. This is an amazing value, compared to other internet sites, and the machine itself lets you do absolutely anything at absolutely any weight from 5 pounds to 350 pounds. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Wife and I loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2008 and still using it today (2020). I had to buy additional rods, but they were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Doug from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: the set was like new. Everything included in the set was there
customer_reviews.text: Although used, the set was like new. Everything included in the set was there. The packaging was excellent . It did not take long to assemble (all the literature was included) and my son and I are using the set -less than a week after receiving it. We're pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: An excellent machine for smaller work out spaces.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent machine. I am short on space so this fit great into the second bedroom next to the treadmill. It will give you a great work out. I am seeing a difference after 3 weeks of use( I am half way threw their 6 week start up program). I plan on enjoying this bowflex for years to come and am happy that is is upgradable.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish got this last year. I have more energy and stamina every day .
customer_reviews.author: Chill

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Rocks  with Bowflex !
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Bowflex XTreme SE Home Gym from Amazon.. saved $400, PLUS saved shipping (free).. carton arrived 2 days earlier than promised in tip top shape. My whole family is pleased with the price, quality and service. Thank you Amazon. Beckley WV
customer_reviews.author: Beckley Guy

customer_reviews.title: It will change your life!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of equiptment. Arrived in a timely fashion. Easy to assemble. Nothing like being able to lift to failure by yourself without the risk of injury. *Side note* The 310lb upgrade rods are highly recommended with your initial order, especially if you are doing squats!
customer_reviews.author: SLucas

customer_reviews.title: a bit of a hassle
customer_reviews.text: the machine is well built and offers lots of options however, the DVD does not help someone unfamiliar with the machine. It shows tons of exercises but assumes you know how to set the cables, etc. Wish there was a how to DVD that demonstrates everything you need to know from day one. Secondly, a piece was broken, I called the company directly, sent them my receipt and have never heard back as promised. So a hassle, ball is in my court to call them again....
customer_reviews.author: D. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex Extreme SE
customer_reviews.text: The Bowflex arrived well packaged with easy step-by-step assembly instructions and tools. This was the easiest, assembly-required piece of equipment, I have ever worked with. The instructions and parts layout were excellent. The how to use CD is well done as are the care and use manuals provided. I couldn't be happier with what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Jack K.

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex Xtreme SE
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion. Very well packed with good assembly instructions. Well made piece of exercise equipment. I have been using the equipment for 2-1/2 weeks now and can already see the results. I absolutely despise exercise and yet find myself motivated by the quick results to keep at it even when it has been a long tiring day. I would recommend this home gym for all ages, both male and female.
customer_reviews.author: JRDj

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex Xtreme SE worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item at very low price from BowFlex. I took about two hours to put it together and I did most of it alone. I am learning the system but I can already feel the workout from the Bowflex Xtreme. It you take your time and do them properly you will feel the burn. This is a great gym for a person like me that doesn't have time to hit the gym. It takes little space and since the price drop its worth the price. If you don't mind changing pulleys which is very easy save yourself 800-900 dollars buy the Xtreme SE Home Gym
customer_reviews.author: Spencer A. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex workout
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are both using our new bowflex on a regular basis. The workout is as good as I could get at any gym and we have the convience of using it at home any time of the day or night without having to travel or pay any membership dues. We are both conpletely satsified with the quality and easy use of this machine. I've already recommended the bowflex to my friends who workout.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Meiling

customer_reviews.title: Nice equipment...a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy and well built. The bowflex will give you a good workout although expect that you will need to add additional rods eventually for the leg extensions. Overall a bit pricey, but after using it for 3 months I would still buy it if I had to do it all over again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex Xtreme SE
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this sysytem. I ordered the item and it arrived early. It did not take long to assemble, but I recommend following the easy to follow instruction for assembly. I am able to do all the workouts as I did with my prior Gold's Power Gym. There are no resistance bands and no lever to move and I was unable to get parts for the prior gym. I have used it for 4 weeks and really enjoy the workouts. I feel the difference between the two. Easy to switch between different exercises. Highly recommend the BowFlex Gym......
customer_reviews.author: H. F. Ropos

customer_reviews.title: A product that stands up the the hype
customer_reviews.text: I debated for a year on whether or not to purchase the bowflex. After deciding that it would more than pay for my gym membership in a years time I decided to give it a try. I have found that with just very little use this machine is easy to manipulate and I get a great work out in the privacy of my own home on my own schedule. I've noticed greater muscle growth and fat burning than I have in the past. Love it. Wouldn't do without it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine With Only Minor Flaws
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great for weight lifting. Unless you need to body build with free weights, this is a good alternative. Once you get the hang of it, changing the cables for different workouts only takes 20 seconds or so. It's sturdy and well built. Installation was fairly simple. This machine offers plently of workouts for all the muscle groups of the body.
customer_reviews.author: M. Frary

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex Xtreme SE Home Gym - Great System - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic overall system. I have been using free weights for many years. I never thought I could get the type of workout from a machine but after only a few weeks you will see substantial results. You will be able to address every muscle group with only a few quick changes to the cables - Great overall workout in 30-45 minutes 3 days a week. I would highly recommend this for someone looking for a home gym.
customer_reviews.author: J. Post

customer_reviews.title: costs more than some BUT...
customer_reviews.text: A great piece of equippment. It costs more than many exercisers but it does more. A great variety of exercises are available and a total body workout is possible with this one piece of equippment. It is large so make sure you have room for it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Mckillip

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex Extreme SE Home Gym is GREAT
customer_reviews.text: the Bowflex is relatively easy to set up. the directions are great. it does take a bit of time to set up correctly...however my husband did it in a short period of time (30 minutes) The Work Out Steps are easy to understand and follow. I could stay on track easily from the beginning. Look forward to many years of excercise from this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. F. Stoughtenger

customer_reviews.title: No Surprises
customer_reviews.text: Recieved Bowflex earlier than expected. Everything looked good right out of the box. Pretty easy to assemble. Really enjoying this machine. Would recommend to anyone looking for a machine for good general fitness.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Goucher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Home Gym!!
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps THE best home gym out there in the market. Highly recommended. Takes awhile to set up but dont let that discourage you. Very sleek, compact, and looks great. You'll be rockin a bowflex body in like two weeks!! =)
customer_reviews.author: H. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex  = Feels Flex
customer_reviews.text: From the first day I put this together, and played around doing a few reps... I feel it, this machine works you out and you do not realize it until the next day....My wife talked me into going with the Bowflex and I am glad she did. It is an awesome piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tibbs

customer_reviews.title: Bowflex Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely quick delivery. Product was exactly as described and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H. Powell

customer_reviews.title: this gym has got it all!  Great for EVERYONE
customer_reviews.text: I've never used such a versatile, compact, easy to use gym ever before. This gym will meet ANYONEs needs....every age, every fit level. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: G. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Trashed
customer_reviews.text: My Bowflex arrived well packaged but after I unpacked it I found it was full of dents. The pieces were so messed up I couldn't assemble it and needed to return it. It was apparent that the shipping wasn't the issue. It must have been packed with the dents already in the heavy metal of the equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Sanderson

product_meta.title: Bowflex Xtreme SE Home Gym
product_meta.description:
Enjoy all the benefits of gym-style vertical design and quality for serious workouts. All in a compact size that fits smaller workout spaces.

AMAZON.COM
Whether you're tired of investing in a monthly gym membership or you just like the convenience of working out in the home, the Bowflex Xtreme SE home gym is a must-have for serious workout enthusiasts. The Xtreme SE lets you perform more than 65 gym-quality exercises, including exercises for the chest, shoulder, back, arms, abdominals, and legs--in short, everything you need to improve strength, tone, or bulk up. Resistance derives from the 210 pounds of Power Rod units, which feel as good or better than free weights but without the latter's inertia or risk of joint pain. If that's not enough resistance, you can also upgrade the Xtreme SE to 310 or 410 pounds.

 The Xtreme SE is outfitted with a number of workout stations, including a lat tower with an angled lat bar for building back and shoulder muscles; an abdominal crunch shoulder harness; a three-position lower pulley/squat station for building your glutes, hamstrings, and quads; and a leg extension/curl attachment. And dedicated lifters will dig the adjustable cable and pulley system, which lets you change your resistance angle to target exercises more efficiently to certain muscle groups. Other details include five-way handgrip and ankle cuffs, an ergonomic adjustable seat with a polyurethane cushion, and a reinforced X-shaped base for maximum stability. The Xtreme SE measures 49 by 81 by 62 inches (W x H x D) and carries a seven-year limited warranty. 

 

The Xtreme SE offers an ergonomic adjustable seat with a polyurethane cushion for added back support while exercising. Key Features: * 210 pounds of Power Rod Resistance offers the benefits of free weights without the inertia or risk of joint pain; upgradeable up to 310 pounds / 140 kg or 410 pounds / 186 kg 
 * Lat tower with Angled Lat Bar for building back and shoulder muscles quickly 
 * Abdominal Crunch Shoulder Harness help build strong, defined abs 
 * 3-Position Lower pulley/squat station to build your glutes, hamstrings, and quads 
 * Leg extension/leg curl attachment will help develop strong, muscular legs. 
 * Ergonomic adjustable seat with polyurethane cushion provides added back support for leg exercises and knee support for lat exercises 
 * Compact size for smaller workout space; reinforced "X"-shaped base for maximum stability 
 * Five-way hand-grip/ankle cuffs are designed to add flexibility and performance to any workout; functions include a regular grip, non-grip cuff, ankle cuff, foot cuff, and a shoulder cuff 
 * Multiple cable/pulley positions are designed to change your angle of resistance and increase the effectiveness of many exercises 
 * Owner's manual/fitness guide comes complete with detailed instructions for each exercise 

 Specifications:

 * Exercises Available: 60+ 
 * Standard Weight Resistance: 210 pounds / 95 kg 
 * Attachments and Accessories: Leg Attachment, Lat Tower, Squat Station, Ab Crunch Accessory, Shoulder Harness 
 * Adjustable Main Pulley System: Built-in (4-position adjustable pulleys) 
 * Machine Height: 6' 11" (211 cm) 
 * Machine Length: 5' 2" (158 cm) 
 * Machine Width: 4' 1" (125 cm) 

 Manufacturer's Warranty
Bowflex machines are warranted to the original purchaser. Bowflex® home gyms limited warranties cover all defects in material or workmanship but do not cover commercial use or misuse by the consumer. The Power Rod units have a no-time-limit warranty. If you wear them out, Bowflex will replace them for free.

 About Home Gyms
While offering the convenience of working out in the comfort and privacy of your own home, home gyms also allow you to focus on specific routines without having to wait in line or switch between a complex array of machines. In addition to improving strength, power, coordination, and muscular endurance, weight training can enhance weight reduction, enhance the immune and cardiovascular systems, and help prevent injuries. In general, home gym machines are compact units designed to strengthen and exercise many parts of the body. While no single home gym can provide a complete strength training solution, they are a convenient way to combine many exercises into a single unit. Some home gyms focus exclusively on upper-body workouts, while other, more advanced units focus on upper- and lower-body conditioning.
feature_bullets: Lat tower with Angled Lat Bar - Build back and shoulder muscles quickly with this integrated tower.
Abdominal Crunch Shoulder Harness - All new ab harness and ab pulley bar help you build strong, defined abs.
3-Position Lower pulley/squat station - Use this station to do squats and build your glutes, hamstrings and quads.
Leg Extension - Use for exercises to develop strong, muscular legs.
Ergonomic adjustable seat with Polyurethane cushion - New design provides added back support for leg exercises and knee support for lat exercises.
Compact size for smaller workout space - Gym-style vertical workout position. Reinforced "X"-shaped base for maximum stability.

5-Way Hand-Grip/Ankle Cuffs - Our unique handgrip is designed to add flexibility and performance to any workout. Functions include a Regular Grip, Non-Grip Cuff, Ankle Cuff, Foot Cuff and a Shoulder Cuff.
Multiple cable/pulley positions - Designed to change your angle of resistance - increases the effectiveness of many exercises.
Owner's Manual/Fitness Guide - Complete with detailed instructions for each exercise.
All-in-one home gym offering more than 65 gym-quality muscle exercises
Lat tower with angled lat bar, ab crunch shoulder harness, and leg extension/curl attachment
Three-position lower pulley/squat station for building glutes, hamstrings, and quads
Ergonomic adjustable seat with polyurethane cushion; 210 pounds of resistance
Measures 49 x 81 x 62 inches (W x H x D); 7-year limited warranty
